Plot webmorph stimulus

Source: R/plot.R
plot_stim.Rd

Arguments for plot characteristics can be:

plot_stim(
  stim,
  img.plot = TRUE,
  pt.plot = FALSE,
  line.plot = FALSE,
  width = NULL,
  height = NULL,
  label.position = "top center",
  ...
)

Arguments

stim

webmorph_stim
img.plot

Whether to include the image in the plot
pt.plot

Whether to include delineation points in the plot
line.plot

Whether to include lines in the plot
width

plot width
height

plot height
label.position

vertical (top, middle, bottom) and horizontal (left, center, right) position of the label
...

Arguments controlling the plot characteristics

Value

plot

Details

Points: pt.color, pt.size, pt.shape, Lines: line.color, line.alpha, Border: border.color, border.width, Label: label.text, label.color, label.alpha, label.size, label.family, label.fontface, label.x, label.y, hjust, vjust, label.angle

Examples

# default values
plot(faces("test")[[1]],
     width = NULL,  # get from image or tem
     height = NULL, # get from image or tem
     img.plot = TRUE,
     pt.plot = FALSE,
     pt.color = "#00AA00",
     pt.size = 1,
     pt.shape = 3,
     pt.alpha = 1,
     line.plot = FALSE, # T, F, or "bezier"
     line.color = "#FFFF66",
     line.alpha = 0.5
)
